title: my phone keeps retarting, and it's locked, how can i unlock my device google pixel xl 'marlin'
content:
hi my google pixel is keeps restarting and it's locked 'i can't start it to allow oem on mode deveppe'. how can i unlock it to flash my phone
i tried to update it  manualy by recovery mode and send file with OTA but i didn't find the perfect update, sometimes i got error message like : signature verifing faild ; and PACKAGE IS OLDER THAN THE CORRENT BUILD EXCEPTED A BUILD NEWER THAN TIMESTAMP 1569803365
how can i Do and thank you so much for help
